Package io.netty.channel

Interface RecvByteBufAllocator

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    MaxBytesRecvByteBufAllocator, MaxMessagesRecvByteBufAllocator
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdaptiveRecvByteBufAllocator, DefaultMaxBytesRecvByteBufAllocator, DefaultMaxMessagesRecvByteBufAllocator, FixedRecvByteBufAllocator, ServerChannelRecvByteBufAllocator
    public interface RecvByteBufAllocator
    Allocates a new receive buffer whose capacity is probably large enough to read all inbound data and small enough not to waste its space.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      static class  RecvByteBufAllocator.DelegatingHandle
      A RecvByteBufAllocator.Handle which delegates all call to some other RecvByteBufAllocator.Handle.
      static interface  RecvByteBufAllocator.ExtendedHandle  
      static interface  RecvByteBufAllocator.Handle
      Deprecated.
      Use RecvByteBufAllocator.ExtendedHandle.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      RecvByteBufAllocator.Handle newHandle()
      Creates a new handle.

    • Method Detail

      • newHandle

        RecvByteBufAllocator.Handle newHandle()
        Creates a new handle. The handle provides the actual operations and keeps the internal information which is required for predicting an optimal buffer capacity.
